channel.title: [PI]Dialogue not showing?[PI]
channel.description:
For some reason, a dialogue for one of my npc's is nto working.
Actionhandler: [code] case 6390: c.getDH().sendDialogues(27, npcType); break;[/code] Note: Yes, it is under first click method.
Dialoguehandler: [code] case 27: sendNpcChat1("Hello + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +. I need your help."); c.nextChat = 28; break;[/code]

item.title: [PI]Dialogue not showing?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Make sure there are no other cases for that NPC calling upon something else.

Read full topic

And are you sure the NPC’s ID is 6390?[/quote]
